summary: A guy dies after collecting comic books for decades. His mom inherits them and she ain't selling. Owners of 2 comic book stores want the collection. Their scheming gets ever more desperate.
cast: Donal Logue|Cary Elwes|Michael Rapaport|Natasha Lyonne|DJ Qualls|Eileen Brennan|Monet Mazur|Danny Masterson|James Duval|Marshall Bell|Chris Weber|Denny Kirkwood|Irene Montalà|Donal Lardner Ward|Ric Borelli|Diana Terranova|Jamielyn Lippman|Jo Bourne-Taylor|Peter Mayhew|Freddie Mercury Jr.|Radhaa Nilia
keywords: murder of an old woman|comics|comic book|rivalry|comic book shop
title: Comic Book Villains
